resources.string:
Finheal Capital is an online lending platform. From where you can get instant personalloan in just a few steps.
a. Install the Finheal Capital app from the Play Store.
b. Register yourself via phone number
c. Fill in your basic details to check your eligibility for availing a Personal Loanthrough Finheal Capital. This process hardly takes 3-5 minutes, after which you shallbe shown an ‘eligibility successful’ page.
d. Upon confirmation on the eligibility, you will need to upload your KYC documentsand fill in a few more details about yourself. It should not take you more than 5-10minutes to do the same.
e. Once you have uploaded the KYC documents and the other additional information,the profile will be verified depending on the authenticity and quality of the documentsuploaded.
f. Once verified, you can apply for a loan through Finheal Capital and sign a Loanagreement.
Any Indian individual above the age of 18 years, who is salaried or has a monthlysource of income may apply for a Personal Loan through the Finheal Capital.
Finheal capital is a digital lending app which provides you instant cash loan from ₹5000to ₹ 5 lakh instantly through a completely paperless process.

When you get a loan from Finheal Capital there is no documentation. All the process ispaperless. You can get a loan anywhere from India with the help of internet connection.There is no need to stand in a long queue.

Finheal capital offers various Personal Loans through Platform ranging from ₹5,000 to₹ 5 Lakh Personal Loan for Salaried: This is a Personal Loan with the ticket size rangingabove ₹ 5,000/- to ₹ 5 Lakh

Each user who applies for a personal loan will be required to submit all document:
a.Documents for KYC like pan card, adhar card.
b.Last 3 month salary slip.
c.Last 3 month bank statements.
Send a video of that technical flow issue or screenshot of that issue with your all detailsand name on ​contact@finhealcapital.in, and we shall reach out to you at the earliest.
